snippet.title: The Dead Linger:  Zombie Game (Teaser/Trailer)
snippet.description:
Here is the promo video I made for this upcoming game. Be sure and check out the link and information of the game. This was a last minute job but I think it came out well.

The Dead Linger is a first-person zombie survival sandbox in which you can venture into a vast, undead world, surviving and exploring in whatever way suits you best.

Donate!: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sandswept/the-dead-linger
Website: http://www.thedeadlinger.com
Follow us!: http://www.twitter.com/thedeadlinger


Video Edited by Bloodvein and Produced by Dara Mactire
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Bloodvein Movies:
http://www.youtube.com/user/BloodveinMovies

Dara Mactire:
http://www.youtube.com/user/DaraMactire


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Click "Like" and "Favorite" if you like this video. Helps me make more!

Tell me what you think in the comments below.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -




Keywords:

Zombie games game online war rpg  survival invasion trailer undead dead die first person shooter game fps daramactire dara mactire the dead linger bloodvein bloodveinmovies thedeadlinger deadlinger
